item.title: BLACK DEJAVU - BLACK DEJAVU ("うたの☆プリンスさまっ..
item.description:
Blacker

than the dark,

Blacker

than the doubt,

Blacker

than the dark

Black! Black!

Black! Black!

Black

in deja-vu
